Class HuffmanCoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • HuffmanCoder

  • public class HuffmanCoder
extends java.lang.Object
    This class houses the functinoality for encoding and decoding files.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HuffmanCoder() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void buildHuffTable(HuffNode node, java.lang.String prefix, java.lang.String[] codes)
      Returns a String array containing the huffman codes of each byte, allocated according to the trie given as parameter.
      static HuffNode buildTrie(int[] count)
      Returns the root node of a full trie for allocating the Huffman codes based on array of byte frequencies.
      static void decode(java.lang.String inputPath, java.lang.String outputPath)
      Reads a Huffman coded file from the first path and writes a decoded file to the output path.
      static void encode(java.lang.String input, java.lang.String output)
      Writes the file in the first path to second path in a huffman coded form
      static HuffNode readHuffmanTrie(BinaryFileInput binput)
      Reads a preorder encoded Huffman trie from input
      static void writeHuffmanTrie(HuffNode node, BinaryFileOutput out)
      Traverses the trie in preorder and writes a 0 for each not-leaf node, and for each leaf a 1 followed by the byte to be encoded as an 8-bit unsigned integer.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • writeHuffmanTrie

        public static void writeHuffmanTrie(HuffNode node,
                                    BinaryFileOutput out)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Traverses the trie in preorder and writes a 0 for each not-leaf node, and for each leaf a 1 followed by the byte to be encoded as an 8-bit unsigned integer.
